plot: Documentary about the international music festival Baia das Gatas, that takes place on the full moon every August, on the Sao Vicente island of Cape Verde. I
title: The Music Cape
plot_es: Documentary about the international music festival Baia das Gatas, that takes place on the full moon every August, on the Sao Vicente island of Cape Verde. I
plot_en: Documentary about the international music festival Baia das Gatas, that takes place on the full moon every August, on the Sao Vicente island of Cape Verde. I
